content.rendered:
Based in Watertown a city in the county seat of Codington County, South Dakota, United States.
The Rare Whisky Shop ships Whisky Globally.

The Rare Japanese And Scotch Whisky Shop

Founded in 2017 The Rare Japanese And Scotch Whisky Shop is an American born company specialising in Scotch and Rare Whisky. Located in the centre of Watertown, South Dakota.

At The Rare Japanese And Scotch Whisky Shop we are perfectionists when it comes to the stock we source. We endeavour to stock the most exclusive and hard to find luxury and collectible whisky from Scotland, Japan and around the world. We ship globally and offer next day delivery in the US, UK and Europe.

We also offer a range of cask services as independent bottlers. We can help you sell your cask of Scotch Whisky and advise you on bottling your cask under our independent label.

Our main objective is to source rare and exclusive whisky and sell at market leading prices whilst providing exceptional customer service. We do not only supply whisky to private individuals and collectors, but also to businesses such as renowned whisky bars, hotels, casinos and superyachts.

Culture

As a growing business we hold ourselves to a strict set of values in various aspects of our company culture. Customers, people and a responsible approach to alcohol is at the forefront of how we operate.Customer relationships are exceptionally important to us and we have long standing relationships with clients who have built up their portfolio’s of whisky with us.

Our customers have independently reviewed us as excellent on Trustpilot through ‘verified purchase’ questionnaires.

Customers

• Put the customer first.
• Offer the highest quality of service.
• Provide innovative solutions.

People

• Treat everyone equally, fairly and with respect.
• Communicate openly, honestly and promptly.
• Prioritise safety and wellness.

Alcohol

• Promote safe and responsible alcohol consumption.
• Provide up to date and accurate information on alcohol.
• Prevent misuse of alcohol.

Contact

We are here to help you.

The world of rare whiskies is a fun and exciting place to be. It can also be a complex one, so if you have any questions on any of our bottles we would love to hear from you. The Rare Whisky Shop has a renowned service for online bottle purchases, offering an incredible next day delivery option with market leading prices.

Remember there is no such thing as a stupid question. Our friendly team will be on hand to answer any question you can throw at them. Feel free to put them to the test.

Please use the contact form for all enquiries.

For all telephone enquiries, please contact us on . Our office is open US 9:00am – 17:30pm Monday – Friday.

General Enquiries
Email: sales@japanesewhiskyrare.shop
US & International:
